projects.title: SuperKluster
projects.bodyText: Voxel X Network is a decentralized, community-driven gaming ecosystem where creators can share and monetize NFT assets and create gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain.

projects.title: Common Living
projects.bodyText: Coliving and apartments for today's renter. Find beautiul spaces with exceptional service, convenient amenities, and all-inclusive options. At Common, your rent gets you more.

projects.title: Credit Capital
projects.bodyText: CreditCapital is a wealth management platform created to bridge the gap between traditional investment networks and blockchain-powered platforms. Its aim is to make mutual investing and personal lending easier and more profitable for participants.

projects.title: Caaring -  Cab Share App
projects.bodyText:
- A Cab Sharing web app made using **Django** for **VIT** Students. People can create a new cab or request to join an existing cab.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.

projects.title: CometChat Kitchen Sample App
projects.bodyText: CometChat Kitchen Sink Sample App (built using CometChat UI Kit) is a fully functional real-time messaging app capable of private (one-on-one), group messaging, voice & video calling.

projects.title: Quiet Hours App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
